knimeNode.name: Random Data Generator
knimeNode.shortDescription: Creates a data table with random data based on the specified definitions

fullDescription.intro: Creates a data table with random data based definitions specified for each field column. Up to 1,000 field columns can be created. The number of rows generated can be configured.
fullDescription.option: Total rows of data to generate
The name of the table column
The minimum value for the random data. Types: String -> Minimum text length (default 1), Integer -> Min number, Date -> Earliest Date (m/d/yyyy format), defaults to 1/1/2000
The maximum value for the random data. Types: String -> Max text length (default 32), Integer -> Max number, Date -> Latest Date (m/d/yyyy format), defaults to 1/1/2100
